derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English tord, of Germanic origin

entry.def: A turd is a lump of faeces.
People sometimes insult someone they do not like by referring to them as a turd .

auth_sentence.content: You look like they put a shirt on a turd.
auth_sentence.res_content: You look like they put a shirt on a turd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You look like they put a shirt on a turd.

auth_sentence.content: Arlen, the little turd who tried to set the woods on fire.
auth_sentence.res_content: Arlen, the little turd who tried to set the woods on fire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Arlen, the little turd who tried to set the woods on fire.

auth_sentence.content: He and his friends also spent long hours inventing their own comic-book series featuring an impish hero, Turd Man.
